function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Elderly living in permanent isolation without social networks and limited social activities","Impact":"Increased risk of complications from COVID-19 and psychological distress","Mitigation":"Provide stronger psychosocial support and connection to social networks","Technologies":"Telemedicine, virtual social platforms","People":"Elderly individuals","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Persons with psychiatric disorders facing worsened symptoms due to social distancing policies","Impact":"Exacerbation of psychiatric symptoms","Mitigation":"Provide specialized psychosocial support and access to mental health services","Technologies":"Telepsychiatry, online counseling services","People":"Individuals with psychiatric disorders","Owner":"Mental health professionals, support organizations"},{"Description":"Interpersonal conflict in financially constrained and isolated families due to stay-at-home measures","Impact":"Increased risk of domestic violence and family conflict","Mitigation":"Provide support services, financial aid, and counseling for families","Technologies":"Online counseling, mobile support apps","People":"Large families in poor housing conditions","Owner":"Social service organizations, government agencies"}]}
